readable.title: 2449552677_ee78f01bae
readable.content: A man in a wheelchair riding to the park . A person in a wheelchair is on a sidewalk . a person wearing a knit cap riding in a wheelchair along a seidwalk outside of a building . A person with a brown hat and black jacket is in a wheelchair crossing in front of a sign that says " park " . The handicapped man wheels past the parking lot .
